data.enText: the practice of training people to obey rules and orders and punishing them if they do not; the controlled behaviour or situation that results from this training

data.chText: 这所学校因纪律严格而名闻遐迩。
data.enText: The school has a reputation for high standards of discipline.

data.chText: 新兵受严格的纪律约束。
data.enText: Strict discipline is imposed on army recruits.
She keeps good discipline in class.

data.chText: 训练方法；行为准则；符合准则的行为
data.enText: a method of training your mind or body or of controlling your behaviour; an area of activity where this is necessary

data.chText: 瑜伽是一种学习放松的有效方法。
data.enText: Yoga is a good discipline for learning to relax.
the ability to control your behaviour or the way you live, work, etc.

data.chText: 他为自己工作是不会有什么成就的——他毫无自制力。
data.enText: He'll never get anywhere working for himself─he's got no discipline.

data.chText: 知识领域；（尤指大学的）学科，科目
data.enText: an area of knowledge; a subject that people study or are taught, especially in a university
to punish sb for sth they have done

data.chText: 这些军官因使用种族歧视性语言而受到惩罚。
data.enText: The officers were disciplined for using racist language.
to train sb, especially a child, to obey particular rules and control the way they behave

data.chText: 管教子女最佳方法指南
data.enText: a guide to the best ways of disciplining your child

data.chText: 自我控制；严格要求（自己）
data.enText: to control the way you behave and make yourself do things that you believe you should do

data.chText: 他规定自己每周至少锻炼三次。

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+带to的不定式

data.enText: He disciplined himself to exercise at least three times a week.

data.chText: 节食是自我控制的问题。
data.enText: Dieting is a matter of disciplining yourself.

data.chText: 纪律严明的军队 / 团队

tr: training to improve strength or self-control

example: the offenders deserved the harsh discipline they received

tr: the trait of being well behaved
example: he insisted on discipline among the troops

tr: a system of rules of conduct or method of practice
example: he quickly learned the discipline of prison routine
for such a plan to work requires discipline
in what discipline is his doctorate?
teachers should be well trained in their subject
anthropology is the study of human beings

tr: punish in order to gain control or enforce obedience
example: The teacher disciplined the pupils rather frequently

tr: develop (children's) behavior by instruction and practice

value.def: Discipline is the practice of making people obey rules or standards of behaviour, and punishing them when they do not.

example.ex: Order and discipline have been placed in the hands of headmasters and governing bodies.
example.tran: 维持秩序和纪律的工作已交接给了校长和管理机构了。

value.def: Discipline is the quality of being able to behave and work in a controlled way which involves obeying particular rules or standards.

example.ex: It was that image of calm and discipline that appealed to voters.
example.tran: 正是那个冷静、自律的形象打动了选民。

value.def: If you refer to an activity or situation as a discipline, you mean that, in order to be successful in it, you need to behave in a strictly controlled way and obey particular rules or standards.

example.ex: The discipline of studying music can help children develop good work habits.
example.tran: 音乐学习中的训练可以帮助孩子们培养好的工作习惯。

value.def: If someone is disciplined for something that they have done wrong, they are punished for it.

example.ex: The workman was disciplined by his company but not dismissed...
example.tran: 那个工人受到了公司的处罚，但并没有被解雇。

example.ex: Her husband had at last taken a share in disciplining the boy.
example.tran: 她的丈夫最后也加了进来一起教训那个男孩。

value.def: If you discipline yourself to do something, you train yourself to behave and work in a strictly controlled and regular way.

example.ex: Out on the course you must discipline yourself to let go of detailed theory...
example.tran: 在高尔夫球场上，你必须训练自己做到不拘泥于细枝末节的理论。

example.ex: I'm very good at disciplining myself.

value.def: A discipline is a particular area of study, especially a subject of study in a college or university.

example.ex: You've got to make sure that people work together across disciplines...
example.tran: 你必须确保让那些出身不同学科的人一起共事。

example.ex: We're looking for people from a wide range of disciplines.
example.tran: 我们需要各个学科的人才。

trans: 学科；学术科目；一门学术领域；学院式的学科；学术领域
理智学科；知识学科；学科；知识
